complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Set up shadcn/ui and core UI components
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Initialize shadcn/ui with Tailwind config and base styles, 2) Install and test core UI components (Button, Card, Input, etc.), 3) Create component showcase page and verify dark mode
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a straightforward setup task with clear documentation. The project already has Tailwind CSS v4 configured. Main work involves running shadcn init command, installing multiple components via CLI, and creating a test page. No complex logic or integrations required.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Firebase configuration and authentication setup
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Install Firebase SDK and create configuration module, 2) Set up Firestore database with security rules, 3) Configure Firebase Storage for image uploads, 4) Implement auth context provider for anonymous/authenticated users, 5) Create test endpoints and error handling
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires setting up multiple Firebase services (Auth, Firestore, Storage), implementing auth context provider with React context, configuring security rules, and handling environment variables. More complex due to multiple service integrations and state management.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create chat UI with Socratic dialogue components
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Create ChatInterface layout with ScrollArea, 2) Implement MessageBubble component with student/tutor styling, 3) Build ChatInput with validation and send functionality, 4) Add auto-scroll behavior and loading states
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity involving multiple UI components, TypeScript interfaces, auto-scroll logic with refs, and responsive design. Depends on shadcn components being installed first but otherwise straightforward React component development.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate Vercel AI SDK with OpenAI GPT-4
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Install Vercel AI SDK and create API route structure, 2) Implement Socratic system prompt with strict guidelines, 3) Add streaming response handling with proper types, 4) Implement token counting and context management, 5) Add error handling and retry logic
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex task involving API route creation, streaming responses, sophisticated prompt engineering for Socratic method, token management, conversation context handling, and error recovery. Requires careful implementation of AI behavior rules.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement problem input system with text and image upload
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Create tabbed interface structure with shadcn Tabs, 2) Implement text input with validation and character limit, 3) Build image upload with drag-and-drop and preview, 4) Add Firebase Storage integration for uploads, 5) Create mathematical symbol picker component
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Involves multiple input methods, file handling with drag-and-drop, Firebase Storage integration, image preview functionality, and custom symbol picker UI. Moderate to high complexity due to various interaction patterns.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Integrate OpenAI Vision API for image parsing
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Create API route for image processing with multipart form handling, 2) Implement Vision API integration with proper parameters, 3) Add text extraction and confidence scoring logic, 4) Implement caching in Firestore to prevent reprocessing
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires API route creation, handling multipart forms, integrating Vision API, implementing caching strategy, and error handling for various image qualities. Depends on existing Firebase and API setup.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Add KaTeX for mathematical notation rendering
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Install KaTeX and configure CSS imports, 2) Create MathDisplay wrapper component with inline/display modes, 3) Add conversion utility and integrate with MessageBubble
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Relatively simple library integration. Main work is installing KaTeX, creating wrapper component, and adding conversion logic. Well-documented library with straightforward React integration patterns.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement conversation persistence and session management
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Design and implement Firestore schema for sessions, 2) Create session management hooks, 3) Implement turn storage and retrieval logic, 4) Add session status tracking and transitions, 5) Implement automatic session completion logic
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex data modeling task requiring Firestore schema design, custom React hooks, subcollection management, status tracking, and automatic session lifecycle handling. Critical for app functionality.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build conversation history sidebar with session management
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Create HistorySidebar with Sheet component for mobile responsiveness, 2) Implement session list with pagination and status badges, 3) Add search and filter functionality, 4) Implement resume session feature
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity UI task involving responsive drawer, pagination logic, search/filter implementation, and session resumption. Depends heavily on session management being in place.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement advanced Socratic logic with hints and examples
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Implement stuck detection algorithm, 2) Create graduated hint system with escalation levels, 3) Build example problem generator with GPT-4, 4) Add problem type detection logic, 5) Implement response validation for misconceptions, 6) Create encouraging feedback system
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Most complex feature requiring sophisticated AI logic, multiple escalation paths, dynamic problem generation, pattern recognition for problem types, and careful prompt engineering. Requires extensive testing and refinement.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Add rate limiting and cost optimization features
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Implement request rate limiting middleware, 2) Add session turn limits with graceful completion, 3) Create context compression algorithm, 4) Implement token counting and limits, 5) Add daily usage limits per user, 6) Implement cost tracking in Firestore
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Complex task involving middleware implementation, multiple limiting strategies, context compression algorithm, token management, and cost tracking. Requires careful balance between functionality and cost control.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement comprehensive error handling and monitoring
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down into: 1) Create error boundary component for React errors, 2) Implement API error handling with retry logic, 3) Add user-friendly error messages with shadcn components, 4) Create loading states and connection monitoring
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Standard error handling implementation with moderate complexity. Involves error boundaries, retry logic with exponential backoff, toast notifications, and connection monitoring. Well-established patterns available.
